SEARCH
Package concert

Class Venue

java.lang.Object
concert.Venue
public class Venue extends Object
Represents the venue for a concert with detailed layout and seating arrangements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Default constructor for the Venue class.
    Venue(int rows, int seatInARow, int left, int right, int middle, int totalSeats, int VRows, int SRows, int TRows)
    Constructs a venue with specific layout and seating details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Venue

      public Venue(int rows, int seatInARow, int left, int right, int middle, int totalSeats, int VRows, int SRows, int TRows)
      Constructs a venue with specific layout and seating details.
      Parameters:
      rows - Total number of rows in the venue.
      seatInARow - Number of seats in each row.
      left - Number of seats on the left side.
      right - Number of seats on the right side.
      middle - Number of seats in the middle section.
      totalSeats - Total number of seats available in the venue.
      VRows - Number of VIP rows.
      SRows - Number of Seating rows.
      TRows - Number of Standing rows.

    • Venue

      public Venue()
      Default constructor for the Venue class.

  • Method Details

    • selectseats

      public Booking selectseats(double VIPleftPrice, double VIPmiddlePrice, double VIPrightPrice, double SeatLeftPrice, double SeatMiddlePrice, double SeatRightPrice, double StandLeftPrice, double StandMiddlePrice, double StandRightPrice)
      Selects seats based on the user's input and creates a booking for those seats. Calculates total price based on the type and location of seats chosen.
      Parameters:
      VIPleftPrice - Price per seat in the VIP left zone.
      VIPmiddlePrice - Price per seat in the VIP middle zone.
      VIPrightPrice - Price per seat in the VIP right zone.
      SeatLeftPrice - Price per seat in the regular seating left zone.
      SeatMiddlePrice - Price per seat in the regular seating middle zone.
      SeatRightPrice - Price per seat in the regular seating right zone.
      StandLeftPrice - Price per seat in the standing left zone.
      StandMiddlePrice - Price per seat in the standing middle zone.
      StandRightPrice - Price per seat in the standing right zone.
      Returns:
      Booking object containing details of the booked tickets.

    • loadVenue

      public Venue loadVenue(List<String> lines, BookingDetails bookingDetails, String concertId, String fileName) throws IOException, FileNotFoundException
      Constructs a Venue with specific seating parameters and initializes seat allocation. This method parses venue layout information and sets up the seating arrangement.
      Parameters:
      lines - List of string data from a file representing the venue layout.
      bookingDetails - Details of bookings for the venue.
      concertId - Identifier for the concert whose venue details are being loaded.
      fileName - Name of the file being processed.
      Returns:
      A Venue object fully initialized with seating and layout details.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      FileNotFoundException - If the specified file is not found.

    • loadTicketVenue

      public void loadTicketVenue(BookingDetails bookingDetails, String concertId)
      Applies bookings from the booking details to the venue layout, marking seats as booked. This method updates the internal state of the venue to reflect the current bookings.
      Parameters:
      bookingDetails - Details of all bookings related to this venue.
      concertId - The concert identifier for which bookings are to be applied.

    • showBookingLayout

      public void showBookingLayout()
      Displays the seating layout of the venue, showing which seats are booked and available. This method visually represents the seat bookings on the console.
